column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Friday July 5 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Tates Creek Rd:
column4: Roadway shutdown in both directions between Dove Run Rd and Robin Rd.

column3: Traffic Alert for Tates Creek Rd:
column4: Police are investigating an earlier serious collision at Lansdowne Dr

column3: Traffic Alert for Tates Creek Rd:
column4: UPDATE 11:08 a.m. - Inbound Tates Creek at Dove Run Rd is now open.  Outbound Tates Creek remains shutdown at Lansdowne Dr.

column3: Traffic Alert for Tates Creek Rd:
